content.rendered:
[mk_page_section][vc_column][mk_padding_divider][mk_fancy_title color=”#524a48″ size=”24″ font_weight=”400″ txt_transform=”uppercase” margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”line-grey”]Request a quote[/mk_fancy_title][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”28″ font_weight=”400″ margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none”]Please fill in the contact form below to request a quote.[/mk_fancy_title][vc_column_text disable_pattern=”” margin_bottom=””]We will give you a call upon receipt of your enquiry to confirm any other details we may need, and also to set a time frame of our response to your request.

Thereafter, we will:[/vc_column_text][mk_custom_list]

  • Perform a search of your strata plan and any relevant notifications registered at Landgate.
  • Conduct an external inspection of your strata scheme to gain a full understanding of the amount of work required to properly perform the functions of management.
  • Prepare a written service prospectus, comprising of a schedule of the management services your scheme will likely need; along with the fees, charges and disclosures that apply.
[/mk_custom_list][vc_column_text disable_pattern=”” margin_bottom=””]Ultimately if you decide to appoint us as your Strata Manager, we will then provide you with a copy of our Strata Management Agreement which will need to be agreed upon at a council meeting, and signed by at least two council members.[/vc_column_text][mk_padding_divider][vc_raw_html el_class=”quote-form”]JTVCdWZiJTIwZm9ybV9pZCUzRCUyMjElMjIlNUQ=[/vc_raw_html][mk_padding_divider][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/mk_page_section]
